title: Can dry impurities transfer to dry clothes or objects? assimalhakeem -JAL
transcript: of sadika from bangladesh is there is muddy in a piece of cloth and i forget to sprinkle water and it dries out if i touch the cloth with my dry hand and put that cloth with my clean clothes does it transfer i will answer inshallah dear from bangladesh says can dry impurity be transferred to dry clean clothes the answer is no if it's talking about methi if it's dried when you put them with pure and clean clothes the impurity is not going to transfer and you cannot see any traces of it therefore there's no problem in that
